sentence.Network_en: There are recognised black spots in marriages which can lead to trouble.
sentence.Network_cn: 婚姻中有一些公认的容易引发问题的雷区。

sentence.Network_en: He is fifty and has been through two marriages.
sentence.Network_cn: 他今年50岁，经历过两次婚姻。

sentence.Network_en: So many marriages have come to grief over lack of money.
sentence.Network_cn: 许多婚姻都因缺钱而以失败告终。

PerfectNetExp.abs: Typically the marriages are and women have two husbands ., 一般来说 , 这里没有婚姻自由 , 一个女人有两个老公.

today , with 40 percent of marriages in England endingin divorce , and with 40 per cent of all children born outside wedlock , it would seem that his fears were well founded .如今英国人的婚姻有40%以离婚告终，英国的孩子也有40%非婚生儿。看来害怕并非没有根据。
strongly against monogamy , Plato advocated this kind of marriages which were optional combination and prenatal and postnatal care .柏拉图反对一夫一妻制，提倡婚姻最优结合和优生优育。
all marriages must prove that they are single . U.所有人结婚都必须证明自己是单身。

entry.def: A marriage is the relationship between a husband and wife.

example.ex: In a good marriage, both husband and wife work hard to solve any problems that arise...
example.tran: 美满的婚姻中，夫妻双方会共同努力去解决出现的任何问题。

example.ex: When I was 35 my marriage broke up...

entry.def: A marriage is the act of marrying someone, or the ceremony at which this is done.

example.ex: I opposed her marriage to Darryl.

entry.def: Marriage is the state of being married.

example.ex: In twenty years of marriage he has only taken two proper vacations.
example.tran: 结婚二十年里，他只像样地度过两次假。

Sentence.sentence: In those where ties to family and community are strong, lifelong marriages can be promoted by practices such as the cultural prohibition of divorce and arranged marriages that are seen as a contract between two families, not just two individuals.

In those where ties to family and community are strong, lifelong marriages can be promoted by practices such as the cultural prohibition of divorce and arranged marriages that are seen as a contract between two families, not just two individuals.
We can infer from the passage that strong family and community ties can contribute to stable marriages.
